mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SEAT WHERE SEAT_NM = #{seatNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT BRANCH_ID as branchId, ROOM_ID as roomId, SEAT_NM as seatNm, SEAT_Y as seatY, SEAT_X as seatX, USE_YN as useYN FROM SEAT WHERE SEAT_NM = #{seatNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

INSERT INTO SEAT ( BRANCH_ID, ROOM_ID, SEAT_NM, SEAT_Y, SEAT_X, USE_YN ) VALUES ( #{branchId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seatY, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || #{seatX, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{seatY, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seatX, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{useYN, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SELECT T.RNUM as NUM ,T.BRANCH_ID as branchId ,T.ROOM_ID as roomId ,T.SEAT_NM as seatNm ,T.SEAT_Y as seatY ,T.SEAT_X as seatX ,T.USE_YN as useYN FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT * FROM SEAT
)A WHERE CEIL(ROWNUM/ #{pageSize, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) = #{pageNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )T ORDER BY 1, 2, 3
